page.title: 18 CHURCHES IN SOUTH-AYR
page.content: There are 7 churches in this area, 4 of which are{Church of Scotland.} The{Rev.M.Dickie}ministers to a congregation of{1400}at{Castlehill {Church,}and at{Alloway Church}the{Rev. {J.W.McGinty}is responsible for a similar number of members.{ {St.Leonard's}congregation of{900}is looked after by the{ Rev.C.Saunders,} while the minister of{St.Columba,}the {Rev.W.Christman,}has a congregation of {1700}gathered from three separate former churches. The{Rev.Father J.Connolly}is the priest at{St.Paul's Church}which has a congregation of{1600 Roman Catholics. There is a{Christian Brethern Assembly at{Woodpark Gospel Hall.}Followers of the{Church of Jesus Christ of Latter {Day Saints,}known as{Mormons,}also have a church in South-Ayr.
